```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(scales)
library(readr)
library(Hmisc)
library(purrr)
library(tidyr)
library(gclus)
library(corrplot)
library(PerformanceAnalytics)
```

```{r}
comm_prop <- read_csv("comm_prop.csv")
summary(comm_prop)

```

```{r}
M <- cor(comm_prop)
corrplot.mixed(M, upper = "color")
```

```{r}
chart.Correlation(comm_prop, histogram = TRUE)
```
